name: simplelogin
description: SimpleLogin is an email aliasing and forwarding service that can be self-hosted or used as SaaS. It protects your real address using aliases, custom domains, and browser and mobile integrations.
features: Email aliasing: Creates unlimited email aliases that forward to your real address.
Custom domains: Uses your own domains for professional-looking aliases.
Reply anonymously: Sends emails from aliases without revealing your real address.
Browser extensions: Generates aliases instantly from Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.
Mobile apps: Manages aliases on iOS and Android with native applications.
PGP encryption: Encrypts forwarded emails with your PGP key for enhanced privacy.
Alias directories: Organizes aliases into folders for different purposes or projects.
Catch-all domains: Automatically creates aliases for any address at your custom domain.
Block senders: Stops unwanted emails by blocking specific senders per alias.
Mailbox routing: Routes different aliases to different email accounts.
Activity monitoring: Tracks which aliases receive emails and from whom.
Import tools: Migrates aliases from other email aliasing services.
